reviews.sentence: Not your typical Hampton find a different one. The place is terribly out of date kind of dingy and had a bad smell from lobby to the room. The bedding was absolutely awful worn out. We usually seek out Hampton Inns because of the wonderful Hilton beds and bedding but this hotel did not deliver on that. I would highly suggest finding a different hotel until they overhaul this place. it is bad.

Decent hotel slightly overpriced. Overall this chain of hotels is decent. However it is slightly overpriced for the experience. Rooms are not the best in terms of size and also amenities. Staff was polite rooms were clean and facilities were decent. Rooms are a little congested. Also no exhaust in the restroom.

Awesome place. Bed and rooms are beautiful. We came in late and there were not any close parking spots so we had to walk a little ways. Our room was right by the elevator and very noisy in the morning. Got woke up earlier than we wanted.

Great Breakfast comfortable room. The breakfast was excellent and was more than sufficient. The bed was quite comfortable. The staff accommodated a request to have a view of the river and that was wonderful. The doors slammed shut and I could hear people talking in the hall. So I did not sleep well the first night. This is pretty typical of hotels that I have stayed in but you had think someone would design a quieter door for a hotel. We had trouble finding the trolley stop on our own so be sure to ask the staff where that is exactly.

Loud noisy kids running up and down the halls all night and slamming doors. You could hear a baby next door crying all night on one side and a dog barking on the other. However the room was very clean and the staff was friendly. Not in a great area there were 3 liquor stores within walking distance one was next door.

Smells of Stale Cigarette Smoke As You Walk Through Doors. The staff were very helpful and friendly and the breakfast was very nice. That being said our room as well as the hallway on the 5th floor especially the hallway along with the whole hotel smells horribly of stale cigarette smoke. We were told the whole hotel is non smoking which I am sure it is now but clearly this was not the case in the past and the carpets need very badly to be replaced so that the place does not wreak of cigarette smoke. We were recommended to stay here by the Cincinnati Childrens Hospital so that was why we chose this hotel but had we known it smelled like cigarette smoke we would not have stayed here because we have a son with a tracheostomy tube that he breaths through and a very medically fragile and complex airway so having cigarette smoke for him to breathe in is NOT what we wanted to experience. We would have switched hotels upon arrival but we were so exhausted from a long day at the hospital and we did not have time or energy at that point to search for another in a town we were not familiar with. We then did not want to have to re pack everything after our first night so we just stayed here but until the carpets are replaced and the whole hotel is sanitized of the stale cigarette smoke I do not think we would consider staying here again despite the fact that the staff were very helpful and friendly and the breakfast was very nice.
Very quiet. This was absolutely the quietest hotel room we have ever stayed in. could not hear people in the halls or in other rooms. Right near highway and could not hear it at all.

Disapointing. This is probably one of the worst Hampton Inns that I have stayed in. The walls of the room were very dirty the décor of the whole facility is outdated and the carpet in my room was clearly patched. It just felt like the whole place was dirty even though it probably was not. I would recommend a renovation. On the plus side the staff was friendly.

Convenient to downtown. We stayed one night in this hotel Hampton Inn Riverfront. The hotel is actually in Covington Kentucky. Our room was somewhat small and had a funny oder when we arrived but it was a room we selected on the first floor through Hilton Honors ap. The breakfast area was pleasant and close to our room. The breakfast was the typical one found at hotels of this level. We did not use the fitness center or any other amenities. The staff were friendly and helpful.

Be aware of renovations. Not sure how long renovations will be taking place but the majority of the floors were dirty. The hotel could have done a better job cleaning the floors in elevator lobby and hallways that had been completed. My sons did not want to ride the elevator because it looked in such poor shape. The stairwells leading to the lobby were locked so you were forced to the elevators to get to lobby without walking outside. The area around the hotel does not look safe. We were thankful that our car was there in the morning. The pool was very cold. I would not stay here again.

Great place to stay if you are going to ballgame. Did a road trip to see the Cubs play the Reds a 4 game sweep against us but still great time. A short walk to shuttle that drops you off a short walk to park for only 1 each way. No hassle and very convenient. Hotel itself was one of the best BW we have stayed in. Huge comfortable. room King Suite. Very friendly staff. Usually housekeeping staff is just quietly going about their jobs. Here they greeted us in the halls wishing us a good day. Very refreshing.
Great stay. This place was amazing. The general manager was a pleasure to meet and the facilities exceeded our expectations. Nothing.

Wedding guests. Very pleasurable experience. wonderful staff and comfortable room. The hotel was located very close to the wedding reception venue. Having the shuttle transportation made it so much easier for the guests.

Very nice hotel. We visited this hotel for a 2 night stay while my nephew was in Cincinnati Children ’s Hospital. I do n’t have any complaints with this hotel staff was all friendly rooms and amenities were very nice clean. It is a short drive to Cincinnati as well as Newport which is a very nice place to visit.

This place offers a great deal for the quality of stay. The lobby and rooms are clean. The staff is professional. The breakfast was delicious. Also they had a complimentary small supper of baked potatoes with toppings with two free drinks including beer. Not sure if that is a normal thing but it sure was a treat. The location is very accessible to downtown Cincinnati as well. I highly recommend Best Western in Covington.

This was our second stay for the same annual conference. The breakfast is really good. The rooms are clean and so is the lobby eating area. The staff is very friendly too. The only thing that I do n’t like is that there is a lot of water on the floor from where people are walking from the pool to the elevator. of the choices in the area we LOVE this hotel.
Nice clean rooms. Friendly staff. Good breakfast. Coffee in lobby all day. Good fitness center.
Great place to stay. The hotel was very clean and had nice amenities. The staff was very courteous. We loved the shuttle to from the stadium.

Very nice. Very clean very comfortable at a pretty good price compared to other highly rated hotels in the area. Fast usable WiFi that allowed me to get some online work done in both the room and in the lobby.

Great location with excellent friendly staff and wonderful facility. Desk staff recommended a trolley ride into downtown Cinci which was cheap safe and fun for our family of four. Had a great time in town. Came back to hotel for a fun swim and some time with friends in the very comfortable and cool lobby. Beds were comfy. We were VERY impressed with breakfast fresh and yummy with great variety. Would definitely recommend this place.
